channel.title: Can't connect to sql database (for highscores)
channel.description:
I use following tutorial :[url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,364364.0.html]http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,364364.0.html[/url]
I keep getting this error when I connect whit admin center Welcom on phpMyAdmin
Fout
MySQL retourneerde: Documentatie #1045 - Access denied for user 'root'@'localhost' (using password: NO)
can someone pls help me.

item.title: Can't connect to sql database (for highscores)
item.dc:creator: @Maximum_ZxZ Maximum ZxZ
item.description:
@Maximum_ZxZ wrote:

Well, you need to connect with the Xam security site to make a password and write it in file after.

Read full topic
